event.title: contains parts of the Jerseyfield Patent of 1770

data.event: Salisbury contains parts of the Jerseyfield Patent of 1770.
The town was formed in 1797 from the Town of Palatine while in Montgomery County.

event.title: was annexed to Herkimer County in 1817

data.event: Salisbury was annexed to Herkimer County in 1817.
